UnitDefinition.Name: Standardise/normalise urine concentration method
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Standardise urine concentration methods based on creatinine. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Normalise by specific gravity
Unit.Description: Normalise by specific gravity. Levine and Fahy (1945).

Unit.Name: Normalise by specific gravity derived from creatinine (Carrieri et al. 2001)
Unit.Description: A specific gravity adjustment is applied by multiplying a creatinine adjusted concentration with a factor (default 1.48 for adults 18 - 68 year).
